segments.text: Waiter , can you come here for a moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you've made a mistake . This isn't what I ordered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So sorry , I must have confused the orders . I'll check it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And also this soup is cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really sorry , I'll bring you a hot one right away .
segments.speaker: S2
